name: Studio Ghibli Recommender 2
description:
Ever wanted to check out those Ghibli movies you've heard so much about, but not sure where to start?

Are you a long-time Ghibli fan, but you're having trouble deciding which movie you feel like watching at this moment?

The latest version of my Ghibli recommender starts you off with the full list of movies from Studio Ghibli, then offers you a wide range of filters to help you narrow it down. Filters include Genre, Age Group, Director, Mood, Time Period, and more specific filters in each of those categories. 

If you'd like a similar tool that functions more like a flowchart, check out the other Ghibli recommender on my home page.

For more of my Ghibli content, I watched and reviewed every single Ghibli movie at https://howdoyousayghibli.weebly.com/.
